argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rebase | |- RR = ( Base ` RRfld ) |
| 2 |  | #P_refldcj | |- * = ( *r ` RRfld ) |
| 3 |  | #P_refld | |- RRfld e. Field |
| 4 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( RRfld e. Field <-> ( RRfld e. DivRing /\ RRfld e. CRing ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpbi | |- ( RRfld e. DivRing /\ RRfld e. CRing ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpri | |- RRfld e. CRing |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> RRfld e. CRing ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cjre | |- ( x e. RR -> ( * ` x ) = x ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ x e. RR ) -> ( * ` x ) = x ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 7, 9 | #P_idsrngd | |- ( T. -> RRfld e. *Ring ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_trud | |- RRfld e. *Ring |
